Title: Exempts injuries or occupational diseases sustained in perpetration of a felony or misdemeanor from workers' compensation coverage
Summary: Exempts from workers' compensation coverage an injury or occupational disease sustained in the perpetration by the employee of a felony or misdemeanor for which the employee is convicted.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to liability for compensation
